resources.string:
The RIGHT SIDE of the screen is for PLAYING. Use your fingers to control the synthesizer(s) by touching the black, blank portion of the screen. You can use as many fingers as you choose. Volume is controlled by the X-axis and Pitch is controlled by the Y-axis.
 
 The LEFT SIDE of the screen now has TABS. There are different tabs for manipulating different things. For instance, to modify the EFFECTS of the current synth, you can change the values on the EFFECTS Tab. Check out the different tabs for all the things you can do: Record output to a WAV file, Create musical loops, Create/modify how synths sound, etc.
 
 This redesign is still in beta. I very much welcome yr feedback at sauce@mattfeury.com.
